Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and high-quality materials, this product truly stands out in its category. I believe it could significantly enhance your experience or solve a particular challenge you're facing. Given its value, I'm proposing an offer of $120 for this item. I'm confident it's a fair price considering the benefits it offers. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information to make a decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
